column4: Hello, would anyone know if there is a linux mail client that will work with Exchange Server 5.5?
evolution
evolution works with 2000/2003, not 5.5
not even with the connector?
this is the first I've heard of a connector, please explain :D
google it
evolution connector
thanks a million ;)
the connector seems to be for Exchange 2000/2003 as well (and shows as being installed on my current setup)
what chip?
I'm not sure what chip. Is there a way to find out? the laptop I use is an Compaq evo N610c
lspci
00:00.0 Host bridge: Intel Corporation 82845 845 [Brookdale] Chipset Host Bridge (rev 04)
a host bridge is no vga chip...
I'm sorry, I thought I posted the graphics info earlier, is that what you're asking?
yes
01:00.0 VGA compatible controller [0300]: ATI Technologies Inc Radeon Mobility M7 LW [Radeon Mobility 7500] [1002:4c57]
driver is "radeon" or "ati"
not sure mate.
but I am
I don't think I understand lol. Am I to download ati/radeon drivers you say? Or?
you already have all drivers on your disk without installing another thing. "radeon" is the open source drivers for radeons. fglrx from ati.com will NOT work on your chip
thanks so much! I was nearly going to install the fglrx lol. So I'm cool with the drivers i have now, wonderful :)
tis a load off my mind
